original_title: ほんとにあった!呪いのビデオ70
overview: Dominating the top spot among psychic horror documentaries. Can you face the truth reflected by the camera? A video of the Marionette poster's husband playing with the puppets he bought for his daughter. A bloody woman's face is reflected on the edge of the shelf behind her husband's puppet. Six other posted videos are included.
title: Honto ni Atta! Noroi No Video 70
